sentences.english: Dissolution of primary wall appears at the neck of sterigma.

擔孢子無色，光滑，橢圓形。

sentences.english: All have burden could go to Lord, He must rest us.
sentences.chinese: 凡勞苦擔重擔的可以到主那裏，他定使我們得享安息。

sentences.english: Am I responsible for the dirty air in Beijing?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，我是否該爲北京污濁的空氣擔一份責？

sentences.english: You had better neglect your relations, than run the risk of offending your patroness.
sentences.chinese: 免得擔那麼大的風險，得罪了你的女施主。

sentences.english: Arbitration fees shall be borne by the losing party , unless otherwise awarded.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁費，除另有規定，由敗訴方擔。
